name: Ko-Tun_Feralo
content:
Ko-Tun Feralo was a Cerean Rebel Alliance quartermaster and squad leader of a Rebel cell that was stationed on Coruscant. Her father, Sahm-Ken Feralo, was a senator in the Imperial Senate and spy for the Rebellion.
Ko-Tun Feralo was a determined fighter and would take any advantage presented to her or her team. She excelled at making the most of limited resources, and insisted that her team knew how to properly make use of any equipment they had.
